name: Low Mem Sky
description:
#DemakeJam Edition

You awake to find yourself on an alien planet, with the desire to achieve one thing... reach the centre of the galaxy!

Made using PICO-8 in 12 Days for #DemakeJam 2018

FEATURES:

Unfortunately, I was unable to add all the features I wanted to during the  jam period. 
I hope to be able to work on this, post-jam, to add more features (like mining, animal species, sentinels, "usable" space stations for trading).

Current Features:

  • Around 180,383,121,450 unique star systems (I think!)
  • Each with up to 8 procedurally-generated planets

Planned Features:

  • Mining resources
  • Shooting weapons
  • Animal species + Sentinels
  • "Functional" Space Stations - for trading
CONTROLS:

On Foot:

  • ARROWS = Walk around
  • Z = <Unmapped>
  • X = Collect Item / Take-off (when close enough)

In Ship:

  • LEFT / RIGHT = Rotate
  • UP / DOWN = Increase/Decrease Thrust
  • Z = Toggle Galactic Map
  • X = Land (when close to planet)
CREDITS & THANKS:
  • Code , Art: 
    • Paul Nicholas (@Liquidream)
      • https://www.liquidream.co.uk/
  • Music:
    • Chris Donnelly (@Gruber_Music)
      • http://www.grubermusic.com/

Additional code snippets that I used/adapted:

  • PICO-8 port of Open Simplex by Felice Enellen
  • Rotate Sprite snippet + Marching Squares by Frederic Souchu
  • Pico World by Gamax92
RELEASE HISTORY:
  • v1.1: Minor bug-fixes and added surface radar
  • v1.0: Initial version
